summary: A fast test suite that validates the core functionality, performance, and configuration consistency of the AnimateDiff video‑to‑video ControlNet pipeline, covering component initialization, input processing, attention mechanisms, noise handling, batch inference, IP‑adapter integration, latent management, motion UNet loading, prompt embedding, and device/dtype compatibility.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and quality of the AnimateDiff video generation product by detecting regressions and ensuring that the ControlNet pipeline works correctly across diverse settings before deployment.
